content: the upper right of the edge of the black part note that you may prefer to wait and do this after the eyes are attached to an item so you can place the spots better in context repeat everything for the second eye block the eyes by soaking squeezing water out in a towel and laying them flat to dry sew them onto something use the yarn needle to sew the bottom edges onto a balaclava hat or headband stuffing them as much as you like beforehand use the black yarn to add a frog mouth and nose dots onto your item if possible fck ice frog mod by lee meredith leedoesstuff com page 4 weaving in ends as you knit pickers step 1 after knitting fi rst/edge st step 2 wrap working yarn around step 3 unwrap end yarn now normally with needle through next needle as if to knit normally so moving it back to the left then st to knit it run end yarn held in now both yarns are wrapped behind needle and over to the right hand down under right-hand around the same way right needle and around over the front same as if to knit step 4 with end yarn now held off to the right side step 5 work the next st normally holding end knit the st normally with the working yarn so that yarn off to the right then repeat steps 1 5 for end yarn is held several more sts down under working yarn/st weaving in ends as you knit throwers step 1 after knitting fi rst/edge st step 2 wrap working yarn around step 3 pull yarn through st to knit normally with needle through next needle as if to knit normally normally also pulling it down st to knit it run under the end strand of yarn end yarn up over top of right- hand needle step 4 complete the knit st the step 5 knit the next st normally step 6 end yarn is now locked end yarn will now run up over the while holding the end yarn strand down repeat steps 1 5 for several working yarn down so working yarn traps it more sts page 5
